VirtualPCI2PCIBridge.description: The `VirtualPCI2PCIBridge` schema describes Virtual PCI-to-PCI Bridge (vPPB) inside a CXL switch that is owned by the host.
VirtualPCI2PCIBridge.longDescription: This resource shall represent a Virtual PCI-to-PCI Bridge (vPPB) inside a CXL switch that is host-owned.  This can be bound to a port that is either disconnected, connected to a PCIe component, or connected to a CXL component.

title: #VirtualPCI2PCIBridge.VirtualPCI2PCIBridge
